channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘That’s exactly what a sock puppet does’: Elizabeth Warren accuses Kevin Warsh of softening his rate stance for Trump
item.description: "If Donald Trump says it, then Kevin Warsh echoes it, even though it contradicts everything he had done for years."

item.title: Starbucks battles the ‘polyamorous’ era of coffee as customers experiment: ‘they’re seeing what’s out there’
item.description: Starbucks’ share of spending at all U.S. coffee shops has fallen from 52% in 2023 to 48% in 2025, according to Technomic, a food industry consulting f...

item.title: Kevin Warsh will inherit a challenge no Fed chief has faced since post-World War II regarding the spiraling $31 trillion national debt
item.description: Debt and deficits will put Kevin Warsh under great pressure to keep interest rates low and rely on short term borrowing. But long term that will have ...

item.title: North Carolina emerges as the affordable millennial destination as Florida fades and Texans trickle out
item.description: “North Carolina is attracting younger folks" who've decided they can work anywhere and want "a nice area," state demographer Michael Cline said.

item.title: Kevin Warsh’s Fed nod sends gold plunging and chops 31.4% off silver as dollar strengthens in Friday trading
item.description: A fear in financial markets has been that the Fed will lose some of its independence, helping catapult the price of gold and weaken the dollar.

item.title: These overlooked stocks are a backdoor way to play the AI chip boom
